structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BULK SALES OF PLANTS, AVOCADOS, LIMES AND MANGOES

text.section:
Sec. 8A-53. Certificates—Distribution; contents.
The Miami-Dade Police Director shall provide and distribute a certificate form, to be completed by growers, transporters and purchasers of said fruit or plants in bulk, which certificate form shall provide for information to be inserted indicating the date of the purchase from the grower, the name and address of the growers, transporters and purchaser, which of the said fruit or plants is sold, the quantity of said fruit or plants, if any, the origin of said fruit or plants and the license tag number of the vehicle, if any, used to transport said fruit or plants from the place of sale by the grower.
